Have any of you guys ever had one of those moments where you do something by accident and it makes you look like a complete douche afterwards and you're just super embarrassed? [/bq]
I once threw an ice cream in a guys face.

Should i elaborate?

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554a52506368726cfa750b00#post_554a52506368726cfa750b00
Basically, me and my family were in the car, and i somehow managed to drop my ice-cream on the floor, so i rolled down the window to throw it out.

As i threw it out, a dude on a motorbike went past, and it smacked right into his face. He just kept going. We kept going, and up the road, we saw that he had stopped and was wiping his face. We got the heck outta there.

topics.body: I don't know if it counts because I don't actually regret it, but when I was still in day-care I punched this girl in the face and got put in time out for it. When my mom came to bet me she was FURIOUS, Until I told her that the girl fucking BIT me for no reason whatsoever. Needless to say her anger got immediately redirected at the day-care lady.

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554a51da6368726cfac20a00#post_554a51da6368726cfac20a00
[bq="Number1pegasus"]"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554a51866368722f63710000#post_554a51866368722f63710000
True! That's why I wanted to hear about other's! 

Laughing at yourself is the best. Its even funnier with friends![/bq]
This was like 3 months ago and I even talked about it here

"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b2ef6b6368722deea60400#post_54b2ef6b6368722deea60400
[bq="EHAN"]There are three things all wise men fear: the sea in storm, a night with no moon,

and the anger of a Packers fan.

So Toski and I were buying school supplies, and a TV had the Packers vs. Cowboys game. The Packers had just taken the lead, and I was expressing my disagreement.

I was talking smack with my brother, something along the lines of "If the Packers win, I'll..."

Then one of the employees asks us "Do you guys need anything?" I look at her, and on her shirt was a very clear Packers logo. That got us to shut up immediately, and she just giggled at us. It was almost as if she was masking her rage. I feel like her statement came off as "heard u were talkin shit."

So yeah, we were pretty terrified, I responded as best I could and then we nope'd the hell out of there[/bq]
So basically, I was talking shit about the Packers and then someone who was clearly a Packers fan comes the fcuk outta nowhere right as I'm doing that
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200
